name: css-vars-docs
description: Generates a comment block with all CSS variables from the specified file to improve readability and provide documentation. The block is added at the beginning of the file, or in the first <style> block for non-CSS files, if available.

scripts.build: npm run build:clear && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:rename && npm run build:uglify
scripts.build:rename: npm run rename:cjs && npm run rename:esm
scripts.build:uglify: npm run uglify:cjs && npm run uglify:esm
scripts.uglify:cjs: uglifyjs dist/cjs/css-vars-docs.cjs -o dist/cjs/css-vars-docs.cjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/cjs/cli.cjs -o dist/cjs/cli.cjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/cjs/postcss-plugin.cjs -o dist/cjs/postcss-plugin.cjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/cjs/vite-plugin.cjs -o dist/cjs/vite-plugin.cjs --mangle --compress
scripts.uglify:esm: uglifyjs dist/esm/css-vars-docs.mjs -o dist/esm/css-vars-docs.mjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/esm/cli.mjs -o dist/esm/cli.mjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/esm/postcss-plugin.mjs -o dist/esm/postcss-plugin.mjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/esm/vite-plugin.mjs -o dist/esm/vite-plugin.mjs --mangle --compress

author: Timo Schlotmann
